The video has been viewed and shared mul: including Facebook, indicating its widespread circulation.
The video shows a structure burning next: with firefighters present and a voice reporting in Italian about a telecommunications tower and a boat on fire.
The Dutch: language caption accompanying the video claims that it shows a 5G tower set on fire in La Spezia, Italy, in April 2020, allegedly due to anger towards 5G technology.
However: official statements from the La Spezia fire brigade and local newspaper reports dismiss the claims and suggest that the fire was caused by a short circuit, not related to actions against 5G. Additionally, the Italian telecom operator Wind Tre confirms that the tower in the video belongs to them and carries 3G and 4G antennas, but no 5G transmitters.
